entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PGO Instrumented SDK fails to load coreclr.dll #95534
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete invalid overloads of `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalRoundedNarrowingSaturate` family #95525
  • ambiguous call on 'OptionsBuilderExtensions' #95524
  • NativeAOT: Memset/Memcpy helpers don't throw NRE #95517
    Future
  • Connection reset by peer error when sending requests using HttpClient #95516
  • forgotten backport bugfix? #95508
  • certificate validation not working properly in .Net Android #95506
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, turkish i does not behave like non-Hybrid #95503
  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory doc comments wrongly claim that the directory must not exist #95501
  • Print preview is not taking over the given print settings #95497
  • [wasm] Setting `maxParallelDownloads` sometimes has no effect #95491

Closed

  • When running .NET App via hostfxr, module initializers not called #95519
  • Docs and XML comments for Min/MaxMagnitude are incorrect #94500
    9.0.0
  • Wrong nuget package versions for Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks and Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Analyzers? #95204
  • build runtime faild Failed to build "CoreCLR component". #95449
  • ValidateOnStart API doesn't allow dependency loading when using IValidatableObject instead of IValidateOptions<IdentityServerOverridesOptions> #95400
  • httpclient need proxy for each request #95342
  • The character filter in HTTP StatusDescription is incorrect or there is a problem with the language pack. #95454
  • Publishing for linux-bionix-x64 using NativeAOT fails #95223
    9.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket memory footprint issue on Linux #71876
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Type.IsReferenceType` #90993
    Future
  • [mono] box+callvirt optimization incorrect when instructions are in different basic blocks #95347
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [ignore] testing xunitlogchecker #95533
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Per CMake docs, mark all RC-only DLLs and C++/CLI DLLs that do not export unmanaged symbols as `MODULE` libraries. #95532
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reporting of type loads via console output and a new event perfcounter #95531
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Always unroll GT_STORE_BLK for blocks with gc refs on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove workaround for closed issue #95529
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix GC regions virtual alloc after #80295 #95526
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Fix/cleanup the encoding/decoding of runtime invoke wrappers. #95523
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Switch HostApiInvokerApp to pre-built test asset #95521
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [QUIC] Use RemoteEndPoint host when TargetHost is missing #95518
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CL_3A to IF_SVE_CU_3A #95514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Factor SSA's dominator tree computation #95507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95505
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95500
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Avoid handing out duplicate `CORINFO_MODULE_STRUCT_*` handles #95499
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable EventSource tests #95498
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish #95496
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix comments of Min/MaxMagnitude{Number} #95495
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete area-owners.json #95489
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Delete `ResourceLookup` in host tests #95522
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Revert "Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross" #95527
    area-Build-mono
  • Support VMR cross arch build #95425
    needs-area-label
  • Delete unused MEM_RESET flag from CoreCLR PAL #95520
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add X0 field init at capture context. #95470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95270
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95504
    area-Build-mono
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix link in library-servicing.md #95509
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disabling mock test #95407
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.x
  • [wasi] Enable WasmEnableSIMD for wasi #95492
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Mono][WIP] Try not fall back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • JIT: Force inline small BasicBlock methods #95484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] WS & HTTP clients more async #95483
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • Wasm runtime features #95486
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NO-MERGE] PR benchmark playground #95142
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimize codegen for atomics #2448

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: support wasm exceptions #1983
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: PublishTrimming= true would be advantageous #1998
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: optimisation for managed helpers #2000
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Align 8 Finalizable types #712
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Question: CT_INDIRECT and vtables #1767
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimisation on compiling problem #1859
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] CORINFO_HELP_READYTORUN_DELEGATE_CTOR implementation #1870
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Is the lowering of LCL_VAR structs correct? #1889
  • [NativeAOT]7.0.4 AOT #2445

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement atomics #2447
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Create throw helper blocks on-demand in codegen #2446

Updated

  • [Async-2]: Tasklet aging #2425
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • relocate `global.json` under `.config/dotnet.json` or `.config/dotnet/global.json` #37281
  • `dotnet [toolname]` before `dotnet tool restore`, make it autorestore if the tool is defined #37272
  • disabling vulnerability checking in version 8 of dotnet #37265
  • `dotnet` 8 tool crashes in WSL under Windows ARM64 VM #37261

Closed

  • Hot Reload doesnt reload changes in strings #26489

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark ApiCompatValidateAssembliesSemaphoreFile as internal #37282
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37255
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Mark ApiCompatValidatePackageSemaphoreFile as internal #37276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the runtime and emsdk versions #37278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add support for test and build commands #37233
    Servicing-consider, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2327479 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #37252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InlineArray fails at runtime when declared as a ref struct. #71058
  • Handling of argument caching in `GetUnderlyingIndexerOrSliceAccess` is inconsistent #71056
  • Compiler is too strict with its requirements for collection-expression code-gen when targeting an interface. #71054
  • Make code action's nested actions publicly accessible #71050

Closed

  • IDE0028 and IDE0300 suggest using collection expressions inside expression trees #71012
    17.9
  • Publish symbols for MSBuildHost #70987
    17.9
  • Add a SourceText.GetContentHash function that produces a hash fingerprint for a file based solely on content. #70752
  • Equals sign (`=`) no longer valid in a project name with .net8.0 #71022
  • Add support for respecting custom configured severity settings in editorconfig #52991
    17.9
  • Flaky test SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember #70994
  • 'AvoidConstArraysFixer' encountered an error and has been disabled. #71042
  • IDE Refactoring for IDE0032 (Use auto property) produces unhelpful/invalid fix #71032
  • Unable to use `nameof` in property: attribute in a record's primary constructor #71005
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow ms time sums to be long instead of just int. #71060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Insert release/dev17.9 to rel branch #71057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cancel the request to copilot when typing start #71055
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Offer use-primary-constructor on abtract types with protected constructors #71053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move background initialization to OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync #71047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prioritize Obsolete attribute over siblings #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9

Merged

  • Do not offer 'use collection expression' inside expression trees. #71026
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71051
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Clarify logic for nav-to searching. #71052
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Properly escape ref path names that contain equals #71038
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix flakey issue with stale/cached/incomplete progression results #71045
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch IDE0005 from WarningLevel to AnalysisLevel #70821
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't offer to introduce constants in attributes for things that can't be attributes. #71044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix use-auto-prop with init-properties #71040
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exception in PackageSettingsPersister #71027
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to vs-extension-testing 0.1.184-beta #70960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Draft - testing out new API to get semantic model with nullability analysis disabled #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow copying for ASP.NET Core 8 seems to be broken #52525
  • [SignalR Typescript library] Floating Promise/Unhandled promise rejection in Invocation message callbacks #52524
  • Add Auto Render Mode To component type="typeof(...)" render-mode="..." For Razor Pages App #52522
  • Perf regression: json #52520
  • Error creating a "Blazor Web App" project #52519
  • After updating .NET 7 Blazor server app to .NET 8, deployment to IIS breaks app when in a folder rather than single website #52517
  • [Blazor] preventDefault does not function in Auto render mode, even if the page is marked with InteractiveWebAssembly #52514
  • Building ASP.NET minimal API with either PublishTrimmed or PublishAot throw BadHttpRequestException: Required parameter #52506
  • Should not UseAuthentication method check services registration same way as UseAuthorization does? #52505
  • Remove/mitigate the nullability of IdentityUserClaim's ClaimType and ClaimValue properties #52504
  • Set < routes@rendermode= "Interactive Server" / > how to set the component to static rendering mode #52503
  • Perf improvement: https #52501
  • DOM Property binding for Blazor #52500
  • `RequestDelegateGenerator` should use case-insensitive parsing for enum route parameters #52497

Closed

  • Writing HTML via BodyWriter is broken when VS.NET "Refresh browser after build" is on. #48897
    Backlog
  • `dotnet watch test` doesn't appear to run the tests and restarts multiple times without file changes on Mac M1 #50441
    Backlog
  • Hot Reload with dotnet-watch and Blazor WebAssembly fails on simple markup .razor changes with "No hot reload changes to apply." in .NET 7 and "not supported by the runtime" in .NET 8 RC2. #51781
  • Kestrel default certificate not loading full chain #52511
  • Blazor HotReload does not respect signalr filters #52472
  • AspNetCore Multi-Tenant Jwt Bearer Token Configuration #44804
    AuthPlanning
  • Unclear how to catch "System.Exception: Correlation failed." and prevent HTTP 500 #45620
    8.0-preview5
  • Reduce database queries for Identity UserClaimsPrincipalFactory and IRoleClaimStore #45712
    AuthPlanning
  • UserManager and SignInManager cancellation tokens #45869
    AuthPlanning
  • Better way to override default RoleValidator #46066
    AuthPlanning
  • When session and cookie timeout call to Azure B2C authorize endpoint fails with CORS error. #46305
    AuthPlanning
  • Improve testing experience for identity #46415
    AuthPlanning
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template sets policy requiring all request to be authorized. #47448
    AuthPlanning
  • Using 3rd-party identity providers is simple ... until you need auth for Swagger😱 or need to write a client #47461
    AuthPlanning
  • What's considered not cacheable re: `AllowsCachingPolicies` #47677
    AuthPlanning
  • Add IdentityConstants.BearerAndApplicationScheme #47938
    AuthPlanning
  • It's 2023 year of our lord and I still can't upload a file larger than 4GB? #52498
  • Identity APIs return plain text response instead of Problem Details for missing fields #49483
    8.0.0
  • RoleExistsAsync method not working in Identity RoleManager #49637
    AuthPlanning
  • _CreateCompileItemsForOpenApiReferences adds generated .cs to Compile even if they are already there. #51659
  • Shadow copies fails to gracefully handle deleted folders between publishes #52433
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #52493
  • Blazor fails to import modules when turkish language region in windows is set #34852
    Planning: WebUI
  • IOptionsMonitor stops updating #52516
  • Blazor: Virtualize Component - Unusual Behaviour with Reference #32086
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor\Razor components: @layout in component do not work for Html.RenderComponentAsync in cshtml #39230
    Planning: WebUI
  • Changing assembly name breaks Blazor Server app #31479
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor PWA breaks if hosted on Cloudflare Pages due to redirected index.html #33872
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Server Not rendering components from the "Shared/" folder when using a Startup type located in a different project #33788
    Planning: WebUI
  • SignalR Client ServerSentEvents does not support `\n` delimited Messages #42001
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor - System.ObjectDisposedException: 'Cannot process pending renders after the renderer has been disposed. Object name: 'Renderer'.' #35655
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Input Type Password Password Reveal #43945
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Server fails to launch with Microsoft Identity Platform #51996
  • Blazor Feature If Outside The Content #52333
  • Can't build blazor app #52121
  • Blazor library component doesn't run on WASM when publishing #52491
  • LazyLoad assemblies functionality broken in Blazor app when migrating from 7.0.13 to 8.0.0 #52162
  • Re-publishing .NET 8 Blazor Web App template to IIS fails: ERROR_FILE_IN_USE #52485
  • Set < Routes @ rendermode= "InteractiveServer" / > how to disable rendering mode on a component #52502
  • Please improve error message on deserialization problem #50439

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b10fad3` to `76bb2af` #52508
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.15
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `99a804e` to `0e12deb` #52509
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.26
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `2c27dd2` to `44db12e` #52507
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.15
  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF + LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b10fad3` to `76bb2af` #52510
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.26
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b10fad3` to `76bb2af` #52513
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    area-infrastructure
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #4417

Updated

  • Added dump referenced objects command #4416

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS Picker dismiss does not work when clicking outside of the Picker #19168
  • Bundling WASDK in Packaged application throws `TypeInitializationException` #19167
  • [WinUI] Adding Toolbar item to ContentPage has unusual drop shadow on menu. #19166
  • Android Release build crashes on device but Debug build runs #19165
  • AndroidManifest no longer gets version number from project file #19164
  • External Keyboard doesn't trigger the ReturnCommand with ReturnType="Go" on Entry #19163
  • Picker SelectedIndexChanged makes selected item not visible #19162
  • I am having the same issue, any workaround? #19161
  • Top tab bar on Shell hides content (iOS only) #19159
  • Binding works in Debug Mode but fails in Release Mode #19155
  • [MacCatalyst] Cannot click a button on MAUI nightly #19154
  • Unreliable Connection to Mac from Windows #19153
  • Windows | Entry ClearButton not taking color of text #19152
  • .NET8 Android Target Framework and Minimum Android Target Framework list are empty #19150
  • [iOS] MenuItem Command not executed with FlyoutHeader set #19149

Closed

  • Make .NET MAUI a first-class part of the LTS cycle #19160
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting MaximumTrackColor on Slider has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18111
    Backlog
  • Xamarin.PreBuilt.iOS[42280:31645665] Could not resolve assembly System.Private.DataContractSerialization.resources, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=zh-CN, PublicKeyToken=null. Details: Could not load file or assembly #17189
  • "selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." #16333
  • Getting "Could not find any available provisioning profiles" when non Entitlements.plit file is added #19148
  • Scrolling a CollectionView with SwipeView items causes exception on Windows #7757
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer NumberOfTapsRequired is not working #11434
    Backlog
  • [iOS] App exceptions on physical device, but works on the simulator #12503
    Backlog
  • SwipeView crashes on Windows when in a CollectionView during scrolling #15546
    Backlog
  • Navigation to modal page #19006
  • Android - Event handler BatteryInfoChanged unsubscribe crashes when no subscribe has happened before #18376
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D6 #18726
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test E1 #18623
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Publish iOS App via cmd - Asset Validation failed #19008
  • .NET 8 on Mac #19147
  • [Android]Scrollbars Visibility property "Never" is not working properly in the ScrollView control #12028
  • [Maps] [Android] Registering for CameraMove events in a custom MapHandler disables Map.VisibleRegion.Center #13186
    Backlog
  • Enable to access dll because it is being used by another process. #11872

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct nullable annotations on IMediaPicker #19157
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #19145
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Testing] Add swipe gestures methods to UITest #19132
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add TapCoordinates method to UITest #19151
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19144
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Blazor] Fix concurrency problem in Android builds #19140

Updated

  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [Testing] Add PressVolumeUp and PressVolumeDown methods to UITest #19131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [WIP][iOS] Fix Flyout Header breaking clicking over items #19125
  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Lazy Load Proxies No Longer Thread Safe in EF8 #32490
  • Query: unnecessary APPLY generated where JOIN is enough is some cases #32488
  • NullReferenceException in Get-Migration in EF Core 8 #32487
  • Create migration bundle without requiring connection to DB #32485
  • .Net 8 won't allow multiple indexes on a single property #32484
  • StartsWith(char) can't be used with EF Core 8 #32482
  • dotnet ef migrations suddenly crashing in OnConfiguration because it can't find the Connection String #32479
  • Error with Primitive Collection and Outer/Cross Apply it #32477
  • How to know the table and column name that is the problem in a foreign key exception in Entity Core? #32476
  • Does EF Core support collection expressions? #32475
  • Concurrency issues of different transactions in the same context #32474
  • Regression? "The object has been removed from the model" on SQLite complex objects #32472
  • translate `Nullable<T>.GetValueOrDefault()` with `IsNull()` #32471

Closed

  • EnableSensitiveDataLogging and using record type as ComplexProperty issue #32486
  • Cosmos: EnsureCreated_returns_true_when_database_does_not_exist and related tests are flaky #32481

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: Generate ordinal values for key properties that used not to be persisted. #32489
    Servicing-consider
  • Use current value in update pipeline when original value is not being tracked #32480
  • Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32478
  • Allow specifying Assembly for migrations #32473

Merged

  • Update DailyBuilds.md for EF9 #32470
  • Cosmos: Generate ordinal values for key properties that used not to be persisted. #32469
  • [release/8.0; Test only] Make Cosmos EnsureCreated tests run async only #32483

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Make ILazyLoader not IDisposable (#32345) #32463
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32467
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32440
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nuget.config with multiple sources causes installation failures #17904

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK]VS version on .NET 9 SDK installation wizard needs to be updated to the latest stable release version. #17836

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix attribute type checking and use null-conditional operator #17902

Merged

  • Add VMR PoC CI yaml #17905

Updated

  • Add Mariner cross-compile VMR builds #17891
  • Enable open ssl sha 1 signatures for CentOS Stream 9 #17889
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #17901
    Branch Lockdown
